answers.text:
Crandall – I hope the following is helpful:
“…The Council Evaluation document allows for the assessment of the performance of Council and assists in identifying areas where Council can improve its outcomes”
http://www.racgp.org.au/scriptcontent/policy/policy_council/councilperformancequestionnaire.pdf
Although not exactly what you’re looking for, this report appears to have some good information - Draft FMP Performance Evaluation white paper
http://www.nefmc.org/press/council_discussion_docs/Jan-Feb%202012/Tues,%20George%20Lapointe_Draft%20FMP%20Performance%20Evaluation%20Memo%20and.pdf

text: Does anyone have an evaluation form  or criteria for local elected officials to evaluate themselves?  I picked up one at a conference a few years ago but I can no longer find it.  Thanks!
title: Local Elected Official Evaluation Criteria/Form
